document_data.name: Cathedral of Night
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cathedral of Night''' was a [[Shadovar]] shrine dedicated to [[Shar]] in the ruins of [[Xinlenal]].
document_data.Structure: The shrine was located inside of a ruined building that appeared to be in no better shape than the rest of the ruined city, although the structure's main entrance had been rebuilt to be much wider.
document_data.Interior: Despite the sorry exterior, the interior was meticulously refurbished. The shrine was lined in black colors, notably with [[onyx]] and [[jet]], and was magically cloaked in shadows. Some of these shadows—which appeared to flicker even without light—were almost alive, and hungrily lashed out to feed on the warmth of living creatures.
document_data.Activities: The Cathedral of Night contained a ''[[portal]]'' to the [[Shadowfell]] that the Shadovar of Xinlenal used to bring supplies into the city to aid with their reconstruction efforts. The shrine's [[priest]] was thus responsible not only for spiritual matters, but logistics as well.
document_data.History: The Shrine was the very first thing rebuilt by the Shadovar when they rediscovered the fallen [[Netherese enclave|enclave]] of Xinlenal in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was completed and operational as of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
document_data.Inhabitants: The shrine's priest was [[Orthinos Eln]]. In addition, the Cathedral of Night hosted [[shade]] and [[shadar-kai (Netherese)|shadar-kai]] guards tasked with keeping nonstop watch over the ''portal''.
